00052 namespace {
00053   struct ByReverseClFi {
00054     bool
00055     operator()(const CommitLogFileInfo &x, const CommitLogFileInfo &y) const {
00056       return x.num >= y.num;
00057     }
00058   };
00059 }

00062 CommitLogReader::CommitLogReader(Filesystem *fs, const String &log_dir)
00063   : CommitLogBase(log_dir), m_fs(fs), m_block_buffer(256), m_revision(0),
00064     m_compressor(0) {
00065   load_fragments(log_dir);
00066 }

00069 CommitLogReader::~CommitLogReader() {
00070 }

00073 bool
00074 CommitLogReader::next_raw_block(CommitLogBlockInfo *infop,
00075                                 BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00076  try_again:
00077 
00078   if (m_fragment_stack.empty())
00079     return false;
00080 
00081   if (m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream == 0)
00082     m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream =
00083         new CommitLogBlockStream(m_fs, m_fragment_stack.top().log_dir,
00084                                  format("%u", m_fragment_stack.top().num));
00085 
00086   if (!m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->next(infop, header)) {
00087     delete m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream;
00088     m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream = 0;
00089     m_fragment_stack.top().revision = m_revision;
00090     m_fragment_queue.push_back(m_fragment_stack.top());
00091     m_fragment_stack.pop();
00092     m_revision = 0;
00093     goto try_again;
00094   }
00095 
00096   if (header->check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_LINK)) {
00097     assert(header->get_compression_type() == BlockCompressionCodec::NONE);
00098     String log_dir = (const char *)(infop->block_ptr + header->length());
00099     load_fragments(log_dir);
00100     goto try_again;
00101   }
00102 
00103   return true;
00104 }

00106 
00107 bool
00108 CommitLogReader::next(const uint8_t **blockp, size_t *lenp,
00109                       BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00110   CommitLogBlockInfo binfo;
00111 
00112   while (next_raw_block(&binfo, header)) {
00113 
00114     if (binfo.error == Error::OK) {
00115       DynamicBuffer zblock;
00116 
00117       m_block_buffer.clear();
00118       zblock.base = binfo.block_ptr;
00119       zblock.ptr = binfo.block_ptr + binfo.block_len;
00120 
00121       try {
00122         load_compressor(header->get_compression_type());
00123         m_compressor->inflate(zblock, m_block_buffer, *header);
00124       }
00125       catch (Exception &e) {
00126         HT_ERRORF("Inflate error in CommitLog fragment %s starting at "
00127                   "postion %lld (block len = %lld) - %s",
00128                   m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->get_fname().c_str(),
00129                   (Lld)binfo.start_offset, (Lld)(binfo.end_offset
00130                   - binfo.start_offset), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00131         continue;
00132       }
00133 
00134       if (header->get_revision() > m_latest_revision)
00135         m_latest_revision = header->get_revision();
00136 
00137       if (header->get_revision() > m_revision)
00138         m_revision = header->get_revision();
00139 
00140       zblock.release();
00141       *blockp = m_block_buffer.base;
00142       *lenp = m_block_buffer.fill();
00143       return true;
00144     }
00145 
00146     HT_WARNF("Corruption detected in CommitLog fragment %s starting at "
00147              "postion %lld for %lld bytes - %s",
00148              m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->get_fname().c_str(),
00149              (Lld)binfo.start_offset, (Lld)(binfo.end_offset
00150              - binfo.start_offset), Error::get_text(binfo.error));
00151     m_fragment_stack.pop();
00152   }
00153 
00154   sort(m_fragment_queue.begin(), m_fragment_queue.end());
00155 
00156   return false;
00157 }

00160 void CommitLogReader::load_fragments(String log_dir) {
00161   vector<string> listing;
00162   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00163   vector<CommitLogFileInfo> fragment_vector;
00164 
00165   FileUtils::add_trailing_slash(log_dir);
00166 
00167   m_fs->readdir(log_dir, listing);
00168 
00169   if (listing.size() == 0)
00170     return;
00171 
00172   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00173     char *endptr;
00174     long num = strtol(listing[i].c_str(), &endptr, 10);
00175     if (*endptr != 0) {
00176       HT_WARNF("Invalid file '%s' found in commit log directory '%s'",
00177                listing[i].c_str(), log_dir.c_str());
00178     }
00179     else {
00180       file_info.num = (uint32_t)num;
00181       file_info.log_dir = log_dir;
00182       file_info.purge_log_dir = false;
00183       file_info.revision = 0;
00184       file_info.block_stream = 0;
00185       file_info.size = m_fs->length(log_dir + listing[i]);
00186       if (file_info.size > 0)
00187         fragment_vector.push_back(file_info);
00188     }
00189   }
00190 
00191   if (fragment_vector.empty())
00192     return;
00193 
00194   sort(fragment_vector.begin(), fragment_vector.end(), ByReverseClFi());
00195 
00196   // set the "purge log dir" bit on the most recent fragment
00197   fragment_vector[0].purge_log_dir = true;
00198 
00199   for (size_t i=0; i<fragment_vector.size(); i++)
00200     m_fragment_stack.push(fragment_vector[i]);
00201 }
00202 
00203 
00204 void CommitLogReader::load_compressor(uint16_t ztype) {
00205   BlockCompressionCodecPtr compressor_ptr;
00206 
00207   if (m_compressor != 0 && ztype == m_compressor_type)
00208     return;
00209 
00210   if (ztype >= BlockCompressionCodec::COMPRESSION_TYPE_LIMIT)
00211     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE,
00212               "Invalid compression type '%d'", (int)ztype);
00213 
00214   compressor_ptr = m_compressor_map[ztype];
00215 
00216   if (!compressor_ptr) {
00217     compressor_ptr = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(
00218         (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)ztype);
00219     m_compressor_map[ztype] = compressor_ptr;
00220   }
00221 
00222   m_compressor_type = ztype;
00223   m_compressor = compressor_ptr.get();
00224 }
